Activity â€“ Identify Cable Terminology
Drag each cable term to the appropriate definition.
You have successfully matched each cable term to its definition.
You have not successfully matched each cable term to its definition. Please click Reset to try again.
Defines the communications and operation support interface that permits the addition of high-speed data transfer to a traditional cable TV system.
Located in the headend. This device communicates with CMs located in subscriber homes.
The direction of a signal transmission from subscribers to the headend.
The rate at which the current (voltage) cycles. Computed as the number of waves per second.
Combining both fiber optic and coax cabling together into a hybrid cabling infrastructure.
The direction of a signal transmission from the headend to subscribers.
